mapper.insert: insert into board (post_num, board_num, subject_content, writing_date, mem_id, post_title, post_content) values (#{post_num}, #{board_num}, #{subject_content}, now(), #{mem_id}, #{post_title}, #{post_content})
mapper.select: select count(*) from board where post_num > 0
mapper.update: update board set post_view_count = post_view_count + 1 where post_num = #{post_num}
